abstract: “From One Second to the Next,” a short documentary about texting and driving commissioned by AT&T from the acclaimed director Werner Herzog, tells four deeply harrowing tales of lives altered by a driver’s focus on a phone rather than on the road.

headline.main: Texting and Driving, the Aftermath in a Movie
